website_summaries.verdict: Very sturdy pet playpen that has a simple design with only 4 panels to assemble.
pros: Playpen is offered in 5 different color options
Works equally well indoors or outdoors with a long-lasting, heavy-duty molded plastic construction
This plastic is plenty tough for active animals and it won't rust
cons: Delivers only 8 square feet of coverage area, meaning it's not suitable for larger animals

customer_reviews.title: Good for a puppy younger than 3/4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Between birth and 3/4 months of age the IRIS 4 panel pen was fantastic for containing my puppy when eyes couldn't constantly be on her. She's a Chihuahua Shih-Tzu Maltese mix, so quite a small dog. However, due to the height of the pen and the slats running lengthwise, she developed the ability to climb (and later jump) over the pen with no issues. For a young puppy or a toy breed I consider this a fantastic choice due to its convenience and solid build quality. For small-medium dogs there might be issues with Mission Impossible style escapes however.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this! My 10 week old Yorkie mix weighs ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! My 10 week old Yorkie mix weighs in at just under two pounds and loves his playpen. He spends the night in it and goes only on the training pads which, with how easy it is to move this playpen, makes cleaning super easy! Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Day Yard or Travel Yard
customer_reviews.text: This pen is perfect for training a puppy! I have a 5 month old yorkie and this is where she plays while at work with me! It folds easy for travel and is a perfect size, it’s also super light weight but still sturdy! I am not sure this would work for heavy puppies like boxers or larger dogs but for the miniature/ toy breeds it’s great! And it’s big enough for a bed-toys-her food/water bowls and her training pad!! My little girl will only be approximately 4lbs when grown so I can see using this as a safe zone thru out her life!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great place to contain puppy while you're home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size pen for my chihuahua puppy and a great place to put him with a bed and some toys when we need him to be safe and contained. Assembles by rods that go down through corners, which is very easy for the humans but I can imagine some escape artist pets might figure out how to get it apart. Also, not that tall so any larger dogs could probably jump out. We're very pleased though for the price, and it is perfect for what we wanted - a place to put the pup when we are home but need him contained when we can't keep eyes on him 100% (cooking dinner, showering, etc.) without putting him in his crate.
customer_reviews.author: jpgm11

customer_reviews.title: Too Easy for Small Puppies to Escape
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 3 month old mini Schnauzer puppy. Even though she weighs just 3 pounds, she was able to easily push along the playpen and move it across the floor. In addition, she also escaped by jumping over the top of the pen. I wanted a place to keep her enclosed while I am at work until she is potty-trained. Going to return this and replace it with a crate, instead. The playpen is cute and easy to assemble, though.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Chihuahua, and this is perfect for her. I love the size--I can get her pen, food, and pee pad all inside it and she still has room to walk around. I also love how light it is--I can move it around easily. I can take it apart easily as well, and use it's sides separately for a doggie gate across openings whenever needed, which comes in handy. I can easily transport it whenever I go on trips in the car. This is my third one I have ordered--I use it in various locations. It is sturdy enough for a small dog like mine, but would not be suitable for a larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: KatieScarlettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. When I got it in this last order there was a damaged part on the corner of the top panel. I thought about sending it back and getting another one but it’s too much work and I was able to still put it together. I do feel if you pay for a product it should be in brand new shape. Not sure if it happened during delivery or if it was that way prior. Since I’m able to use it I didn’t bother sending it back. Other than the damage, it is an awesome product. It is very sturdy, save an extremely easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN LYONS

customer_reviews.title: Not as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a door, once together it's hard to manage to get pee pads changed lifting and folding to get it cleaned up without having to take apart having to lean over, also easily moved by my 3lb puppy across room when she got upset being in it, I found it across the room from where I put it...overall it's pretty but not as I hoped, but that's just me...and she refuses to use the pee tray...I hope it works out for others
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Works well and thick plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an older Bichon. I removed one panel and backed it up to his crate. This gives him room to use the bathroom, eat, walk around and get back in his crate when he wants to. THis has really helped with his doggy dementia. He doesn't get scared when he's home alone. I love that you can add and remove panels too.
customer_reviews.author: M  Berry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble play area
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 3 month old Morkie Poo who wants to be in our company at all times but isn’t old enough to have free access to the entire house. It is big enough for him to comfortably play and compact enough to fit into our living room. It folds flat making it easy to pack up. We had purchased a large one (different brand) that is difficult to assemble. I wish I had purchased this first.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri L Elizandro

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This pen is a God send while potty training my 12 wk, 4lb. Pomeranian puppy. I layer it with pee pads, put her in it until she goes, or while I’m busy doing other things and can’t keep an eye on her. She can’t squeeze through the slats, nor can she knock the pen over. I also put her in it if I’m going out for an hour or two without worrying about her safety. I do have it bumped up against the wall to keep it a bit more secure. However, I don’t recommend this for larger or heavier dogs because it is made of plastic and not very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: meshybelle

customer_reviews.title: very cute and easy to customize but does not store well
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my ability to add to it or detract from it quickly to adjust to my needs. I bought two sets so that I could use them to devide my room in half to keep dogs out of the way while I clean, but also setup play areas for troublemakers! The one drawback is that there is no easy and convenient way to store it, it will not fold up on itself in more than one place.
customer_reviews.author: LizDaGrooma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I purchased this item. I use it for a multitude of things. I place my dog in it when my toddler is eating to keep him away from the food. I use it around the house to stop the roomba from going where I don’t want it to. I’ll use two panels as a gate along a hallway. It’s light, easy to fold and store, as well as put together and take apart. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Missaymoo

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly And Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy and quick assembly. It works perfectly for my new puppy. The only issue is it slides easily on tile which moved it off of the pee pad I had down. I’ve put something study weights outside so it doesn’t slide now. She’s just a 9 week old miniature dachshund so that gives you an idea of how light it is. Be sure to account for growth. She has plenty of room to play and was asleep when I returned home.
customer_reviews.author: jan smith

customer_reviews.title: Panels
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these panels and I have been very pleased with these panels they are just what I wanted. I do have a problem with the second order I received today as one of the white caps that covers the cut end of the rod was missing. I have contacted the company and will update this review when I receive a response fro them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Raft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kittens
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pen - perfect for keeping young foster kittens contained. Easy to move, bars close enough together that even a 3 week old kitten can't squeeze through. Recommend getting the cover too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for dogs that don't want to get out anyway.
customer_reviews.text: Speaking for the enclosure itself (not just these extension panels). This is good for gentle dogs, but our new boxer puppy was easily able to push this whole enclosure around and get under it. We used it on a tile floor in the kitchen. Maybe if it was zip tied into place its be better.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two little mutts when I travel with them. I can put them outside of my travel trailer and not worry about them running off. It's high enough they can't jump it. They both weight about 12 pounds. It's perfect. It goes together very easy and it is light weight, lays flat for storage. I don't need a gate because I can just lift them in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Milkcherry

customer_reviews.title: Love these for my pups!
customer_reviews.text: Beat per purchase ever. Take it to park, beach anywhere. I got 8 pieces and it is a great size when put together for my toy pom and toy yorkie to play in. So easy to put together. It’s a little difficult to carry that many pieces around but well worth it to give my fur babies a nice place to play outdoors with out having to worry about them sneaking under a fence or wandering off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this blue??
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to get the blue puppy play pen for my new jack russell puppy. When I opened it I was slightly disappointed because the blue play pen was not the blue that it looked like in the pics. It is grey with maybe a hint of blue. I am keeping and not sending it back but just so you know it is not the blue like the pics show. It was easy to put together and my puppy feels at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, but came Missing panels
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to recieve this for my puppy. But when i opened the box, it only arrived with 2-panels, when i ordered the 4 panel pet playpen. It was a very big disappointment. The quality of the product seems very well made. I would have loved to give 5 stars. I contacted manufacture support so hopefully i can get missing panels quickly.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a new puppy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the playpen and the add-on panels for my rapidly growing and active German Shepherd. She's a handful right now and this is doing exactly what I hoped it would do. She has room to play but doesn't have to be watched constantly. In a couple of months when she's bigger I'll sell it online and imagine I'll get close to what I paid. I am very happy with this purchase. Well packaged and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Garrett

customer_reviews.title: What we needed and wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product. Seems a little pricey for something that is basically all plastic, but it went together so easy, is just big enough to leave up but is easy to callapse and store somewhere, and is convienient enough to move around from room to room that the price is okay and not worth docking a star on the rating. We liked how they provided the cushion pad/feet for the bottom since we have hardwood floors, and the color of grey is spot on for living with.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality- Great for crate rest.
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund is on four weeks crate rest due to a back injury, and we wanted to get something that she would feel included and that didn't have a top. This worked perfectly since you can take one side off and make the fence more confining in a triangle shape. It's good quality and there are rubber feet so it won't damage hardwood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleR

customer_reviews.title: Not secure.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it when I saw it, but when my Yorkie puppy of 3months got inside, she started to climb over and she got out!!! I think that the holes should be much smaller. I couldn't return it because it was late. What I am going to do is buy a thick plastic that you can buy by yards and pull it all over it to cover the holes. It is so nice, but I can't let that happen again!
customer_reviews.author: L.Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and bought an extra.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter’s two small dogs. Loved it so much got one for when I babysit. They don’t mind being in it if they can be close to where we are. It’s good for when you are cleaning house or doing something that requires your attention but you don’t want to put them in the crate. Running to the mailbox or taking a shower but you can’t leave them to their own devices for whatever reason. (Puppy is still potty training.)
customer_reviews.author: Regina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Tree Protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep our 1-year-old away from our Christmas tree. I got 2 extension sets and put them together. We don't have the tree up yet, but compared to the $50+ I 'd have to spend for a real baby playpen, this is a fantastic deal. Each gate is a very good size and pretty sturdy, so she's not going to get past it too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Great rabbit playpen!
customer_reviews.text: My sisters raise rabbits. Netherland Dwarf (pictures, max weight is around 2.5lbs) and American Fuzzy Lops (max weight is to be 4lbs), the Iris playpen is perfect. The Iris 4 Panal pet playpen is very easy to put together, it can fold or move easily, very easy to store, okay the pink one we got 3 months ago has never been put away, it’s used daily. The plastic is easy to clean, holds up well to use and moving. We use it indoor and outdoor. It’s lightweight to move also, but sturdy. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Good in-house pen for small dog
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small pen to confine my small 6 lb dog that wasn't a crate. I wanted something big enough to put a bed but not too large to take up too much space. I wanted it heavy enough to keep her confined but also easy to move around. This pen met all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen
customer_reviews.text: This item is terrific. My daughter bought me one for my little Yorkie because I had no yard where I was renting. Then I moved to a great place that had a yard but one side was not fenced in. I bought another play pen and opened up the 2 sets and made a fence. It works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty L. Varpness

customer_reviews.title: IT'S WONDERFUL !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just want set the record straight. Got the Iris play pen. 24 inches high. Also got extensions. Al have rods and rubber ends for floor. With the two added detention it is a little shaky with the extensions, but it's because they atre hinged. All you need to do is put a piece of wood or cardboard to secure the middle hinges and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA J. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Great to contain hurt animal
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this to contain my dog after surgery. Very simple to put together and take apart. If you lift it up it will fold flat in one move. Long single hinge pin makes it a snap to assemble with no tools and no effort. Pull out one pin and you have a gate. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: OldHermit

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a "containment" area for our new 8 week old pekapoo, and it is perfect for the job. 4 wee pads, and the entire bottom is covered leaving enough room for her food and water bowls and bed. It has seriously reduced the "Cleanup on aisle 2!" emergencies, and it gives her room to take care of business and still walk around, unlike her crate that has her very confined.
customer_reviews.author: ITGeek

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I use it to stretch across my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use it to stretch across my kitchen (which is linoleum) and my family room (which is carpet). I keep my dog in the kitchen during the day in case she has any accidents, she will be confined to the linoleum. I have a 5.5 lb. miniature picture and she doesn't try to jump over the gate/pen. This is great for little dogs but I would not recommend if you have a larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a puppy
customer_reviews.text: It took our 8 week old, extremely tiny puppy about 2 minutes to figure out how to climb out of this. I don't know why there are all these horizontal bars that make climbing so easy - seems like it would be plenty strong with just the vertical supports. It's attractive looking, but will only hold an elderly or very sedate dog.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink! A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Needed a playpen for my maltipoo and this was a great price AND great quality. I’d buy another in a heartbeat but I don’t need it lol LOVE it! *update* bought the two pack extension. Great amount of room for my tiny dog to run around in!! Whole set matches - sturdy - looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent puppy playpen
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with how incredibly easy this is to assemble and disassemble. It's light weight and yet sturdy. It's a great tool for pad training a puppy. It's also great for containing your puppy, keeping him in sight, safe yet with more freedom than a cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the lightweight design
customer_reviews.text: this pen has been great for me to travel with.it is very lightweight but not flimsy. i take my (12 lb cavalier king charles) dog to work with me and this fence keeps him where he needs to be. i also like that it can be taken apart. i use two panels kind of like a baby gate. it wouldn't stop him from getting out if he really really wanted to, but he is a good boy and i use it just so he doesn't follow me if i get up from my work area.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L

customer_reviews.title: Super Pet Playpen
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to see how big this pen is. It is super easy to put together and gives our little puppy all the playing room he needs with room to grow. I also love how you can just fold it in half and slide it behind the couch when not in use. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Iris pen I’ve owed and holds up great for my small puppy. I use two to create a play/eat/sleep area to contain the puppy. Use the other one as a long gate in open area of home. Easy to assemble and move around. Pink one was almost half the cost of the white one.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely54

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and tear down
customer_reviews.text: Requires very little space to store or transport. Very easy to assemble and take down. Small rubber bumpers on bottom to help prevent scratch floors. If you need a bigger space, just buy another since you can just add panels when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My dog easily escaped from this. I wish i invested in a kennel instead With a top. This will work for a toy dog maybe. My dog is small under 10 lbs but he can climb out and I had to get creative and put a heavy top on it
customer_reviews.author: NicoNik

customer_reviews.title: Could be handy- but not for pets.
customer_reviews.text: It’s flimsy- more so than I was expecting. Wanted to use this for our puppy - just to hold for a little but at a time while I worked on things at home and couldn’t supervise him. He was determined and able to completely climb up and over. He could’ve also just knocked it over if he wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small area for my dogs to rest. This was a good choice until it arrived without all the connecting rods. I sent an email to the company with no response to solve this issue. Now I have to improvise to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: F. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, perfect for a small pup or dog!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another taller pen for my Yorkie puppy. This is by far my favorite of the two. I can just remove a corner 'pole' to leave a corner open for her to go in and out during the day, and I replace the corner pole to secure it closed when she sleeps in the pen at night. Another plus - it's easy for me to reach over the sides. Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this pen. We did add a roof so puppy can't climb out but still super easy to move around. I can block my kitchen off with it so pup can be with me while cooking or just set aside somewhere and lock baby in. I bought a second set to use as potty yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tracina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: IRIS Exercise 4-Panel Pet Playpen without Door, Pink, 33"W x 24"H I purchased 2 of these 24" IRIS exercise pens on Amazon and they arrived yesterday. Loved them. BUT the problem is one of the rods which hold the panels together arrived broken. (This isn’t “like new”.) It is so hard to get ahold of Amazon customer service... How do I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: T Nicolau

customer_reviews.title: Light enough for a shitzu to easily push around.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this little fence we use it as a night pen for our shitzu Maxi. The only thing that we do not like about it is it is easy for her to push around. Even when we use it outside she can easily push it around. I wish it had a places where you could stake it into place when it is in the grass. It was easy to assemble and with a pull of one long pin it is easily opened for her to move in and out of it freely. Good product but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This playpen has been a tremendous help. Keeps the puppy out of trouble when we can't watch him. I don't know how helpful it will be as pup gets bigger, but if we can get 6 months of use out of it, I'll be happy (we have a small breed). At least I know the pup isn't eating our electrical wires while I'm in the kitchen preparing dinner.
customer_reviews.author: KindleFL

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an older, small dog. We set it up in the living room to keep him safe while we were gone. It can be opened up and used against the wall if you have a dog that you trust not to climb on it. My old dog doesn’t attempt to escape anymore so we opened it up and made the space much bigger. It’s also handy to leave open while we are home and he can wander in and out as he likes. We also have food bowls attached to the sides. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: with out them it sits much better on my floor and carpet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 and just seconds after opening it ordered another one...I DO NOT use the little feet things you are to use on the bottom....with out them it sits much better on my floor and carpet...one i use for a create...the other I use to separate the room..when someone is in a bad mood....yes I have recommended this to my friend...oooh and this is so much more lighter then my old one...about a 10lb difference.. This one is so easy to load up in car for visits with the furbabies
customer_reviews.author: sybil smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, handy to use , easy to take with you. Can not go wrong in buying this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It works for all kinds of stuff. It is very handy around the house, to take with you just to have on hand. Can’t go wrong with a puppy, small dog or extra... I use mine everyday.
customer_reviews.author: army-mom

customer_reviews.title: Missing rods
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for use as extensions, however contrary to what is shown on the site, they were to also include 2 21 inch metal rods,,,,these were no where to be found. Amazon is responsible for this and should make it right. The panels are useless unless the rods are with them.
customer_reviews.author: k.ck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set I have purchased. I love these crates because you can connect them together to make one large area, or multiple smaller areas or just use one or two panels to block a doorway. Planning to take all three sets on a camping trip to give the dogs plenty of room to hang out.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: this is such a flimsy product my puppy no more than 4months old at the time of purchase kept pushing the gate and even knocked it over and escaped no i would not buy again its not sturdy at all and will not stay in place
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: not recommended for Australian Shepherd pups
customer_reviews.text: The pro's of this are that it's lightweight and it's easy to assemble and a good price. Here come the cons: my Toy Australian Shepherd 12 week old puppy uses the slats as a ladder and climbed out. I thought it was a fluke and put him back in and watched. He got his leg stuck as he was falling but I was right there and got it out. If I hadn't been close I hate to think what cold have happened. I wish I kept the box so I could send this back. It just doesn't work for my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great fence, UPS careless shipping though.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the portable fence but, UPS seemed to disregard the large fragile warnings visibly on the box. Long story short the fence only has a minor scuff despite the damage it received. It's sturdy and definitely something worth investing in.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is recovering from surgery and it’s perfect fir easy use. Pull up the long rod/pin and its opens. Close the panel and insert the ling rod, its closed. Downfall is, he’s learned ti scoot on his butt and can move the pen a good distance, it’s not heavy, very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dilloway

customer_reviews.title: Made More for a Small Puppy.
customer_reviews.text: There was a big difference in the first puppy play hard and this one I purchased. The plastic was much more flimsy and the small dachshund I put in it was able to move it across the yard. She only weighs 8 pounds and ended up breaking this within just a couple weeks. Invest in one of the more sturdy play yards unless your only putting a small puppy in it. Even 8 pounds was too much hopping excitedly up and down against it.
customer_reviews.author: NC Girl in the Big World

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this play pin. It's perfect for what we needed it for. We have a 6 week old pitt puppy and this is perfect size for her. We will need to upgrade but more than worth the money! Great product made of a sturdy material. We use it on carpet and it doesn't slide when she jumps on the side
customer_reviews.author: victoria copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: he doesn't like to sleep ANYWHERE but in it
customer_reviews.text: my doxie, Simon, had back surgery and the crate i had for him i needed to kneel down and put half my body into to get him out....it got to be too much for MY back.....i purchased this for him to recover in and sleep in since he could no longer sleep in bed with me. he LOVED/LOVES it still!!!! he's fully recovered and loves his "den" as we call it..i leave the gate ajar....he doesn't like to sleep ANYWHERE but in it....and his little sister Lily curls up with him!!!!! one of my BEST purchases EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irish Doxie

customer_reviews.title: It is nice it fold flat for a smaller storage area
customer_reviews.text: This is relatively small for a dog however I ordered it for my guinea pigs. I will ultimately end up ordering another to attach together. It is nice it fold flat for a smaller storage area. It is nice it can be expanded for additional space. A small guinea pig could fit through the bars but we use it mainly to keep the cat away and the baby guinea pig safe.
customer_reviews.author: Toni D.

customer_reviews.title: There’s no escaping this pen!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sick bunny in this right now. The first one I bought she could slip right out between the bars! Not this one!! This is perfect!! You can add panels to it to make it any size/shape you want!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Plastic fence panels
customer_reviews.text: Can be used as pen or to block areas to keep pets or children at bay. I mainly use to keep dog out of areas in my home. Can link several together as needed. Light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS EVARD

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: We have actually purchased two of these one with the gate and one without. They work very well for helping to train our Yorkie on his wee pad. They also work well for playtime and are very easy to move from place to place. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Straycat2010

customer_reviews.title: It's good material but too small
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our small chihuahua and turned out to be too small, we wanted to use this as an alternative for her cage/kennel. So we we put her bed and food bowls inside it didn't and we could only put half of a training pad inside of it. So it wasn't for us. The pictures made it seem a lot bigger and we thought since she was so small it would fit. But the material its made out it is great, its super easy to assemble and I really like how it stays together with the poles. It was just too small for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: !!WOW!! This is a very beautiful pink!! I love it and will work perfectly for my needs.. fast shipping too!!.. I figured it's cheaper to buy the six panels.. two in each box.. plus I don't need the gate.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane & GypsyRose Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: If your dog jumps on the side of this pen the pen will collapse on the dog. There is nothing preventing it from collapsing on itself. I returned this item! I would not recommend this item unless you are going to modify it yourself by placing boards on the top with screws to prevent it from collapsing. Horrible Product and very unsafe!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher withrow

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine the disappointment when I open my box and only half the pen was there. The closest ups store to return it is 35 miles from my house so it is not time or cost efficient to return it. I just ate the loss. Buyer beware. I would prefer 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lalley

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra small or small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great and simple product. Was easy to install and serve it just right. It’s only good for extra small or small dogs. I have Havanese puppy so this play pen is working but large dog has stronger teeth to chew plastic and can jump over. My puppy tried to chew his way out but his teeth can not handle plastic 😅
customer_reviews.author: Yekaterina Bezpalaya

customer_reviews.title: this is a really good and sturdy cage and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good and sturdy cage and easy to assemble....I ordered 2 and was sent one and another box with just two panals.... no where to complain, so open your package and make sure you get what you ordered...star in Texas
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy in many ways
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping...Easy to maneuver, easy to assemble and easy to dismantle, asy to fold. Its good for small dogs. If ur dog will grow more than 15 lbs,I think the dog can jump out wasly too. But all in all I like it. Its what I need for my puppy
customer_reviews.author: guy guyz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something that could contain my 6 wk old kitten so I didn't have to leave him in the guest bath. This is perfect and takes maybe 2 minute's to put it together. I even take it apart some times and use half as a gate. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick solution
customer_reviews.text: You can put it up and break it down easily. It is light. So, that being said if you'r dog is a bigger dog and jumper it probably isn't the best solution for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha

customer_reviews.title: Pen for small dog
customer_reviews.text: I really like the easy assembly, and also easy to fold to put away. Perfect pen for my puppy. Can be used inside or outside. Light and easy to move. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: P K

customer_reviews.title: Flexible design to meet your needs
customer_reviews.text: Created a play area for my puppy. I Love the IRIS products! Easy to put together and clean. I added an additional pen with the door. I have a Toy chihuahua puppy and it works well for her. Although its quite sturdy not sure if it would work for a larger breed puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary C.

customer_reviews.title: ... I think the inside of the pen could be better designed. I have to small dogs that cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because I think the inside of the pen could be better designed. I have to small dogs that cannot always hold their bladder all day, so I leave puppy pads in the corner. They are leg lifters, and it would not be issue as I have dealt with this for years now, but there are grates on the inside of the pen which makes for a long clean up process. It should be flat with no little spaces. Other than this, I like it. I bought the extenders to make it larger, and it works well for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Neel

customer_reviews.title: Dog escaped.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when this came because my 10 lbs morkie has separation anxiety. In three days time, hes managed to learn how to get out! I watched him climbed up the side and out the top. So i bought the mesh roof. Nope! Still managed to get out of the corner which doesnt close as tightly as it should. Otherwise the product is well made and easy to use. The dog thinks so too!
customer_reviews.author: lauren connolly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. It is a good size for my pug puppy. The plastic is light weight and the assembly was quick and easy. At times I put it up against the doorway as a gate.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Go

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until our puppy grew.
customer_reviews.text: These panels are sturdy and nice for the price. I bought this set for our Frenchton puppy. It was so much nicer than keeping her in a kennel while we were gone during the day and at bedtime. However, a month later and she has doubled in size! Our puppy can now climb up and over the wall. I recommend this for a puppy that will STAY little.
customer_reviews.author: Jen75

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for a puppy
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't hold my 7lb puppy. He moved it with his body weight and was able to get it to a point he climbed right out of it when I turned around. It is too easy to fold and move. It's nice it's collapsible but not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great price serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put around my Christmas tree so my dogs could not get to the ornaments and put is definitely a bonus cuz I can also put the dogs in the kennel whenever I need to leave the home
customer_reviews.author: Penny Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our little chihuahua puppy. It’s great and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: StevieRap

customer_reviews.title: many configuration options
customer_reviews.text: pros: can be used in a few different setup (two = triangle against a wall, three = triangle enclosed, four = square enclosed); also had them bungee corded to my puppy's kennel, and used as an extension area for feeding. cons: none
customer_reviews.author: aTypicalEngineer808

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I foster dogs and sometimes I get puppies. I tie the play pen to the sides of the crates. Then I can set the puppies in there and not worry about them getting into trouble. It’s easy to set up and it’s easy to clean. It’s sturdy enough to hold in active puppies. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mslynda

customer_reviews.title: Very satified
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this playpen, it's color is cute and girly. It worked for weeks, until today my almost 6 month old bunny jumped out of it twice!! I couldn't believe it. Now she is actually allowed to roam the apt and the playpen has been turned into baby gates so she can not get into certain groups spots. Wish all colors came with the option of a door like the white version. Oh and it's super easy to clean. Wish they would make a mat to go with this play pen.
customer_reviews.author: Shanay

customer_reviews.title: Easy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the doggo when he’s naughty. It fits him and a small bed when needed. I like how it comes in sections and it can be customized to block off rooms. Unless your dog is rambunctious and likes knocking this down this probably won’t work, but it does the trick for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kderno

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible use
customer_reviews.text: I use these to provide a corral for my puppies and dogs. They connect together with giant plastic "nails." The head fell off of one and it makes it hard to take out. I have used up to 3 sets to make a large area for puppies. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Fur baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: It held my newest fur baby . He was happy in it once introduced to the older fur baby’s he was well adjusted. When they get over excited he goes behind his playpen . I then put him in it. He rests well in there.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver with our new puppy. Easy to put together, reconfigure and move. I’m getting rid of all our old puppy gates and going with these everywhere instead
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L.  Adams

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and easy to assemble. It works well for my small puppy. She has enough room to play. I received it within 2 days of ordering. It is extremly light weight and does not come with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this item with a door previously and loved it. Now we have two dogs so we wanted it larger and bought this one without a door and made a larger pen. So sturdy and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Hermes

customer_reviews.title: My puppy climbed it like a ladder and escaped! Just in the house.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 3 stars only because my puppy a Westie is an escape artist. She climbed up the side like a ladder. Other than that it’s easy to setup and move.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hale

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected, even without the extensions. I often use it to block my dogs into a tiled back room instead of kenneling them when I go out. Nice big play yard too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Beagle puppy escaped after one day
customer_reviews.text: Thought this playpen was going to be great. Nicely made, easy to assemble, nice color BUT our three month old beagle puppy figured out how to climb out after only one day.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playpen and very pink!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the new addition to the family. Paired with a two-panel extension, it's the perfect size for our toy poodle puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for A Small Dog
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this puppy play pen for a month now. We LOVE it! There isn't a gate so you'll have to pick up your puppy to get it in and out of the pen, but it has been a life saver for our home. We put our puppy in it when we can't keep our eyes on her in hopes to save things from getting chewed. I probably wouldn't recommend this for a larger dog. It's not real tall and they'd probably jump out. It is also very light weight so a larger dog would probably just push it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It's light so it's easy to move around but it's durable enough to keep my little Yorkie contained. I bought a second one for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: beck

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it & so do I
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for me and my puppy... I'm able to keep her contained when needed and within view at all times... It is great for her to move around in and is very roomy... I bought the 2 gate extension for added space... Lightweight, yet sturdy enough to keep this active girl in one place... I love the fact that it is easily assembled and I can move it around without any problems... Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Very large playpen
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is really large and nice for cats or dogs. I use it to block off my stairs sometimes. The only downfall is that my puppy is able to climb up to the top and jump over it. 🤦🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Shantrell

product_meta.title: IRIS 24'' Exercise 4 + 2 Panel Pet Playpen without Door
product_meta.description: Color:Pink| Style:4 Panel PenIRIS 24'' Exercise 4-Panel Pet Playpen without Door, is perfect for puppies, small to large dogs, and other family pets. The IRIS Exercise Pet Playpen can be utilized indoors or outdoors; the pet playpen is portable and provides 8 square feet of exercise space for pets! Each panel measures 33.6"W x 24"H; door measurements 14.5''W x 16.5''H; the distance between bars is 1.5''. The IRIS Playpen is made of durable, heavy-duty molded plastic, the playpen will last for years and will never rust! The panels interlock securely with full-length connecting rods, and the pens can be positioned in different shapes to suit your pet's needs best. Each panel features a non-skid rubber foot to protect flooring. To create a more spacious exercise pet playpen, add IRIS 24'' Exercise 4-Panel Pet Playpen Panel Add-On, Pink, ASIN: B008V5QKJG and IRIS 24'' Exercise 4-Panel Pet Playpen Roof, White, ASIN: B006UJGFZY to keep pets safe and secure!
feature_bullets: The IRIS Exercise Pet Playpen can be utilized indoors or outdoors; the pet playpen is portable and provides 8 square feet of play space for pets
Each panel measures 33"W x 24"H; door measurements 14''W x 16.5''H; the distance between bars is 1.5''
To create a more spacious exercise pet playpen, add any IRIS 24'' Exercise 4-Panel Playpen Panel Add-On
Made of durable, heavy-duty molded plastic, and the playpen will never rust

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
